translations: 舔；卷过；鞭打（lick 的单三形式）

sentences.sentence: She licks a lollipop and sings the song in the afternoon!
sentences.translation: 她舔着棒棒糖，在下午的时刻中唱起了歌！

sentences.sentence: Oh, good-licks; are you in real dead-wood earnest, Tom?
sentences.translation: 哦，真的吗，你是说真的吗，汤姆？

sentences.sentence: He was ready to take his licks.
